content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Customizable home page available in Platform Directory September 25, 2023—Besides the default Cyber Risk Overview home page, you can now set which app you want to land on after signing in to the Trend Vision One console. For more information, see Platform Directory. Platform Directory © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Customizable home page available in Platform Directory
